_meta.source: Researched from Visit Norway, UNESCO, and cruise guides

transit_routes.name: Shuttle to Ørnesvingen
transit_routes.note: Eagle Road viewpoint. Dramatic hairpin road switchbacks.

transit_routes.name: Trollstigen Excursion
transit_routes.note: Famous mountain road with 11 hairpin turns. Glass viewing platform.

transit_routes.name: Taxi to Dalsnibba
transit_routes.note: 1,500m summit. Snow possible year-round. Best fjord panorama.

featured_experiences.name: Fjord Viewpoints
featured_experiences.note: Eagle Road switchbacks offer iconic views. Multiple photo stops.

featured_experiences.name: Trollstigen Mountain Road
featured_experiences.note: One of Norway's most famous roads. Open May-October only.

featured_experiences.name: Kayaking the Fjord
featured_experiences.note: Get close to Seven Sisters and Suitor waterfalls. Guides available.
